GateDocument.TextWithNodes:
Dear Colleague,
You are selected to receive this message in the genuine belief that it would be of interest for you.
The International Conference on Physics, Chemistry and Application of Nanostructures "Nanomeeting 2009" will take place in Minsk, May 26-29, 2009. The following traditional areas are covered: - physics of nanostructures - chemistry of nanostructures - nanotechnology - spintronics - quantum computing - bioinformatics - nanosize optical and electronic devices.
More details can be found at http://www.nanomeeting.org and received by e-mail: nanomeeting@nanomeeting.org
We are looking to see you in Minsk.
Sincerely,
Co-Chairmen of Nanomeeting-2009 Professor Victor E. Borisenko Professor Francois Arnaud dТAvitaya
